title: Q-ball perturbations with more details: linear analysis vs lattice
authors: Aleksandr Azatov, Quoc Trung Ho, Mohamed Mahdi Khalil
abstract:
We analyze in detail the interactions between non-topological soliton
(Q-ball) and its perturbations. We extend the previous literature by carefully
identifying the domain of applicability of linear analysis as well discussion
of the FLS Q-balls. Applications to the early universe physics are briefly
commented.
